2020.context: Teladoc Health, Inc. is a virtual healthcare company focused on telehealth, chronic care management, and mental health. COVID drove telehealth adoption. Merged with Livongo.

competitors.name: Amwell (American Well)
competitors.notes: Telehealth platform competing for health system partnerships

competitors.name: MDLive
competitors.notes: Virtual care provider later acquired by Cigna

competitors.name: Doctor on Demand
competitors.notes: Telehealth provider merged with Grand Rounds

competitors.name: Doxy.me
competitors.notes: Simple telehealth video platform

competitors.name: Health system telehealth
competitors.notes: Epic MyChart, health systems building own capabilities

competitors.name: Livongo (acquired)
competitors.notes: Digital chronic care management

competitors.name: Omada Health
competitors.notes: Digital therapeutics for chronic conditions

competitors.name: Ro
competitors.notes: Digital health company for telehealth and pharmacy

2024.context: Teladoc Health, Inc. is a virtual healthcare company focused on telehealth, chronic care management, and mental health. Integrated virtual care platform. Goodwill writedown.
